title: Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report
content:
1. Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report  The Associated Press
  2. Backlash after U.K. race report seeks to ‘dispel myths’ about racism, tell ‘new story’ about slave trade  The Washington Post
  3. UK must do more to address 'serious issues' with racism, says Boris Johnson  Guardian News
  4. Black lives do matter in Britain: this is not complacency, but common sense  TheArticle
  5. The Sewell report displays a basic misunderstanding of how racism works | Kalwant Bhopal  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report  The Associated Press
Backlash after U.K. race report seeks to ‘dispel myths’ about racism, tell ‘new story’ about slave trade  The Washington Post
UK must do more to address 'serious issues' with racism, says Boris Johnson  Guardian News
Black lives do matter in Britain: this is not complacency, but common sense  TheArticle
The Sewell report displays a basic misunderstanding of how racism works | Kalwant Bhopal  The Guardian

localize.title: 黑人顾问因种族主义报告而退出英国政府。
黑人顧問因種族主義報告而退出英國政府。
人種差別報告書を受けて黒人アドバイザーが英国政府を辞める
